ygData.subject: RE: Char Carillion
ygData.msgSnippet: i didn t mention, i was the same faction category with or without the flute, but only with the flute would the vendor sell to me.  so it must have bumped me to
ygData.messageBody:
i didn't mention, i was the same faction category with or without the flute,
but only with the flute would the vendor sell to me. so it must have bumped
me to a higher level of that same faction category. i agree with everything
you say. the dark elves in sro while not KOS will not sell to me with or
without flute, so i must be very low dubious, while those merchants in
commons must have been very high dubious.

Shada



>
> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > mention it is simply a faction song. it absolutely has a
> difference with a
> > flute. example, in west commons i went to the inn and was
> told to get the
> > heck out. sing carillion, get the heck out. play
> carillion with a flute,
> > Hello Shada you might find an orc pick handy...
>
> I did not produce the same results.
